entry.source: {F812}Demonoid man\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415004}That rookie demonoid who was once{F801}rummaging through the trash is now{F801}the King of Tokyo...{F801}{F802}Wasn't there some legend about a{F801}Sengoku warrior like that? I like{F801}him, so I'm going to root for Akira.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demonoid man\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415004}That rookie demonoid who was once{F801}rummaging through the trash is now{F801}the King of Tokyo...{F801}{F802}Wasn't there some legend about a{F801}Sengoku warrior like that? I like{F801}him, so I'm going to root for Akira.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demonoid man\0{F87A,103}{F813,1,415102}A Tokyo where everyone can live in{F801}equality and enjoy life, huh?{F801}That's a big damn commitment.{F801}{F802}...I knew Akira even before he{F801}became a demonoid!{F801}{F802}There's a part of him that's weak.{F801}I bet he's really pushing himself{F801}to do this.{F801}
